en-us: Are you sure you want to clear all Terrain?
Image aspect ratio ({ImageAspectRatio}) is not compatible with Size values (X {RegionWidth:int}, Z {RegionHeight:int}). For best results, adjust the Size or import a new image.
Heightmaps only use the red channel.
Image resolution ({ImageWidth:int}x{ImageHeight:int}) is too low for the target Size values (X {RegionWidth:int}, Z {RegionHeight:int}). For best results, decrease the size or import a new Heightmap.
Filling empty voxels with water in the transform.
Duplicating voxels to the target transform.
Filling voxels in the selection with {material}.
Importing voxels to the target transform.
Moving voxels to the target transform.
Pasting voxels to the target transform.
Replacing {source} voxels in the selection with {target}.
Edit/apply plane when using plane lock in manual mode
Click Upgrade to improve the way water joins with terrain at the shores.

The upgrade will only be applied to this place. This will automatically adjust shallow water shape on existing shorelines. You might want to review and hand-edit the results afterwards, especially around streams, waterfalls and any other non-horizontal water surfaces. The upgrade can be reverted right after its completion using the Undo command.
